text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- National Democratic Rally party (NDR) was set up under the presidency of Abdelkader Bensaleh.
- The killings recently increased as legislative elections draw near.
- The creation of NDR party is considered as a party of hope in Algeria.
- The creation of NDR party will modify the Algerian politicaly chart.
- Moderate Islamic Hamas party to hold its congress on March 19. The party will discuss the issue of changing its title despite reservations expressed by its conservative leaders.
